content:
Pardon my teflon memory. I know @Debi Willis is coming. Who else?

I'm on a panel 1-2pm today, and another at 9 am Thursday. Leaving after our weekly call 1-2 pm Thursday.

I’m arriving this afternoon and will leave Friday afternoon. I’m there for the interop showcase face 2 face meeting Thursday and Friday.

Debi Willis

I was supposed to be but canceled last minute needed to be mom. Very
disappointed. Was going to get to play with MHD
